name: Crazy Color Boy
description: Crazy Color Boy is an amazing colorful game with unlimited fun. This Holi you are here at the girl’s hostel. Your friend has challenged you to color the girls in the hostel. You accepted the challenge and gathering all your courage, you dared to enter the hostel campus, dodged the security guard and started to climb the building. Your objective is to collect the color balloons in the way and shoot at the open window to color the girls. Be warned! Not everyone likes being colored! Especially the old warden so be careful don’t dare to color the warden. Security guards are also chasing you. Jump on another side to dodge them. Experience the never-ending madness of the Crazy Boy. Let’s see how crazy are you?
